spell.name: Snowball
entries: You conjure a ball of packed ice and snow that you can throw at a single target. Make a ranged spell attack against the target. On a hit, the target takes {@damage 3d6} cold damage, and must succeed on a Constitution saving throw or be knocked {@condition prone}.

entriesHigherLevel.name: At Higher Levels
entries: When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 2nd level or higher, the damage increases by {@dice 1d6} for each slot level above 1st.
